title: Super Mario Bros
description: Mustachioed plumber Mario must rescue Princess Peach from the villain Bowser, navigating through the dangerous and secret-filled Mushroom Kingdom.

title: The Legend of Zelda
description: Young hero Link must rescue Princess Zelda and recover the Triforce pieces from the evil Ganon, exploring dungeons and solving puzzles.

title: Metroid
description: Bounty hunter Samus Aran explores planet Zebes to destroy the dangerous Metroids and face the space pirates' leader, Mother Brain.

title: Mega Man 2
description: Robot Mega Man must defeat the eight Robot Masters created by Dr. Wily, acquiring their special abilities to save the world.

title: Castlevania
description: Simon Belmont, a member of the vampire-hunting clan, invades Count Dracula's castle to defeat the lord of darkness and his army of monsters.

title: Donkey Kong
description: Mario (called Jumpman) must climb structures to rescue his girlfriend Pauline from the hands of the gorilla Donkey Kong.

title: Contra
description: Two elite soldiers, Bill Rizer and Lance Bean, infiltrate the alien Red Falcon base to save Earth from an extraterrestrial invasion.

title: Final Fantasy
description: Four Warriors of Light embark on a journey to restore the power of the four elemental crystals and save the world from darkness.

title: Kirby's Adventure
description: Kirby, a cute pink ball, sets out on an adventure to recover the pieces of the Star Rod and save Dream Land from King Dedede.

title: Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles
description: The Ninja Turtles - Leonardo, Donatello, Michelangelo, and Raphael - fight against the Foot Clan and Shredder to rescue their master Splinter.
